item.description:
Back to where it all began ... your favorite place and mine, The Wooden Tap.

Rejoice! As we will be returning to the restaurant where the first brick was laid, and the foundation excavated. Where Americans, Russians, Ukrainians, Belarussians, (am I leaving anyone out?) came together, crossed language and cultural barriers, and built a castle to incredible heights! From the Kremlin to The White House and beyond...

Okay, so I am getting a little carried away. See you guys May 18! )))

Dale
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the host or hostess, where can I find the Russian Meetup Group?

group.name: The Hartford Russian Language Meetup Group
